about_the_game:
Step into Mad Experiments: Escape Room - The Sanctuary, an all-new chapter where madness and mystery collide. This DLC transports you to an abandoned convent, a refuge where Professor Cheshire once sought escape from his deteriorating mind.

Haunted by sorrow and filled with complex, mind-bending puzzles, the sanctuary is steeped in eerie atmosphere and chilling backstory. Explore its desolate halls, uncover hidden clues, and solve cryptic challenges to unveil the secrets of Cheshire's madness.

Play solo or in a team of up to 4 players in co-op mode as you race against time to escape this haunting, interactive environment. Can you solve the puzzles and find your way out before the lingering despair consumes you?

Features:

  • New room with intricate puzzles set in a haunting convent

  • Uncover the tragic story of Professor Cheshire’s descent into madness

  • Play solo or in co-op multiplayer with up to 3 other players

  • Solve puzzles and discover hidden secrets in this immersive escape room
